CustomField.formula: if( text( Delivery_Note__r.Sales_Order__r.Ware_House__r.City__c) == 'Kolkata', 'PPLCU'+RIGHT(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), LEN(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)))) - 2)+'PKL'+RIGHT( Name , LEN(Name) - 4),if( text(Delivery_Note__r.Sales_Order__r.Ware_House__r.City__c) == 'Gurugram', 'PPLHO'+RIGHT(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), LEN(text(YEAR( DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)))) - 2)+'PKL'+RIGHT( Name , LEN(Name) - 4),'Please select Place of Supply from SO.'))
CustomField.label: Packing List Number
